titlestmt.subtitle: Finding Aid
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Tiffany Tawzer.

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded in NoteTab Pro. Encoded by Deborah A. Richards. 2007-02-12

did.head: Collection Overview
did.abstract: This collection is in 1 box and contains photographs, invitations, songs, newspaper clippings, and other memorabilia from the commencement and reunions of the Class of 2004.

bioghist.p: The Class of 2004 was the 126th graduating class of Smith College.

scopecontent.p: The Class of 2004 Records contain materials describing the history and activities of the Class of 2004, including materials from commencement, reunions, and other important events. Types of materials include photographs, invitations, newspaper clippings, programs, letters, and other memorabilia.
Individual biographical files are also available, and often include photographs, photo albums, newspaper clippings, letters and correspondences, and class notes.

accessrestrict.p: The records are open for research according to the regulations of the Smith College Archives without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.p: Single photocopies may be made for research purposes. Permission to publish material from the documents must be requested from the Smith College Archives. Smith College owns copyright to any published material relating to college events and activities. Provenance and copyright ownership of other materials is unknown and researchers are responsible for determining any question of copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please use the following format when citing materials from this collection:
Class of 2004 Records, Box #, Smith College Archives.

acqinfo.p: The Class of 2004 Records were created by the students and donated to the College Archives.
